about_the_game:
The DLC contains the legendary Kolhid sword and a big bag of gold that you can use on the arena. But it`s not the main purpose.
Support us!
By purchasing the DLC you`ll support our indie studio and make us believe that in the world of big publisher studios we are still able to make AAA games on our own. Games that we love to make, games made by players for players. And as a gratitude you`ll get the very Kolhid sword.
